price: Et quant à ceux qui prennent des protecteurs en dehors de Lui, Allah veille à ce qu’ils font. Et tu n’es pas pour eux un garant.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهُ حَفِيظٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِوَكِيلٖ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ittakhadhū min dūnihi awliyāa al-lahu ḥafīẓun ʿalayhim wamā anta ʿalayhim biwakīlin
